resources.string: Well look at you, fluffy puff ball. Or is it puffy fluff ball? I can\'t remember. You should probably go to the right and read some of those signs.
You can move by swiping left, right, up, or down. Swipe towards an object to interact with it.
Yay. You can read signs. Good job.
Yes, keep reading the signs. READ ALL THE SIGNS. THE SIGNS CONTROL YOUR LIFE.
You should probably go to the right before I get distracted any more.

What is that thing to the left you say? Well, I shall tell you a story that has been passed down through generations. It is a house. They are locked by default, but once you acquire a mystical key item you can gain access to them. Once inside, you have the ability to save the progress of your game using the ominous checkpoint flag and store items such as apples or pumpkins in a magically teleporting chest.
Would you like to save the game?
Do you want to use a key to unlock this house? This action cannot be undone.
You don\'t have enough space to hold this item! Please move some of your items into a chest to make room.
Please come back when you have finished the quest.
It seems you\'ve played all the quests currently available. Check back later for more!
This part of the map hasn\'t been finished yet! Lazy developers…
I want to eat a lot of apples. Could you go around and pick up about 10 apples for me?
Thanks for getting me apples! Om nom nom nom nom.
